metadata.title: CVE-2023-52671 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix hang/underflow when transitioning to ODM4:1 [Why]Under some circumstances, disabling an OPTC and attempting to reclaim itsOPP(s) for a different OPTC could cause a hang/underflow due to OPPs notbeing properly disconnected from the disabled OPTC. [How] Ensure that allOPPs are unassigned from an OPTC when it gets disabled.
